Located in big fish territory.

Norway Bay Fishing is located on the Ottawa River in Norway Bay Quebec. We are less than a hour drive away from downtown Ottawa. Although many may think because it is so close to a big city how can the fishing be good? Well it is some of the best fishing in the world..

We got proof.
